The station's studio is located at Unit 806, Atlanta Centre, Annapolis Street, Greenhills, San Juan City, and transmitter is located at Palos Verdes Executive Village, Sumulong Highway, Antipolo City, Rizal, sharing the same site with 99.5 Play FM and Jam 88.3. ph.name: DYFR
ph.description: 98.7 DYFR-FM, a local station of Far East Broadcasting Company (FEBC) Philippines, first went on air in October 1975. Due to the unavailability of AM frequencies, this station went to the FM band. Since then, DYFR-FM has been broadcasting Christ to the Visayas by radio. The station features a unique combination of Gospel music, news, teaching and preaching programs.

ph.name: DYTR
ph.description: DYTR Bohol 1116 Khz is a radio station based in Tagbilaran City, Bohol broadcasting at 91.1 MHz. The studios for both of these stations are located at CAP building located at the corner of J Borja Street and Carlos P Garcia Avenue, while the transmitter is located just outside of Tagbilaran. This station broadcasts a masa format under the brand name “True Radio,” which has been used since 2007. Unlike other masa stations, however, the DJ’s do not engage in green jokes and the like. 911 FM True Radio is considered to be the most listened to station in Bohol.

ph.name: DYRI
ph.description: RMN Iloilo DYRI 774 kHz is an AM radio station owned and managed by Radio Mindanao Network now known with the brand name of Radyo Mo Nationwide or better known as RMN. This RMN station in the Ilonggo province is the new number one radio station in Iloilo in the two consecutive official radio listenership surveys by the Kapisanan ng mga Brodkaster ng Pilipinas (KBP) and the Radio Research Council (RRC) through its research contractors — Nielsen and Kantar Media in the year 2011 to 2013. This is a historic performance as the former number one radio station — DYFM Bombo Radyo Iloilo served as industry leader for over 40 years and had never been dislodged in the ratings chart through the years.

ph.name: Ave Maria
ph.description: Ave Maria Radio is a listener supported 501(c)(3) non-profit organization that employs broadcast radio, mobile technology and internet streaming to offer news, analysis, teaching, devotions and music to demonstrate the Good News that Jesus is Lord over all areas of life. We show that the teaching of Christ, through His Church, offers a rational view of the world, a deep sense of spirituality, a firm family life, enhanced human relationships, and the creation of a culture of life and love.

It provides an unadulterated dance music that caters to entire age spectrum and to people from all walks of life. This is a tribute to 89.1 DZMZ and a gift to all its avid listeners after a decade of quench for dance music. Up to now, Bamibi FM covers the Occidental Mindoro, South part Of Oriental Mindoro, some parts/islands of Western Visayas and Palawan.
